speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the debate on the report by Mr Purvis, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on mortgage credit in the EU ( 2006/2102(INI) ) ( A6-0370/2006 ).
original: President. – The next item is the debate on the report by Mr Purvis, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on mortgage credit in the EU ( 2006/2102(INI) ) ( A6-0370/2006 ).
